short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a merged interface to the two Western Armenian dictionaries: Nayiri and Yetvart Kovan's dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a merged interface to the two Western Armenian dictionaries: Nayiri and Yetvart Kovan's dictionary. It provides to styles of search:

1) Classical Search - via extension popup where the user enters input text and direction.
2) Highlight Search - via context menu (Right Click), where the user can select a direction and make a search for the highlighted text.


The dictionaries provide the directions:
Western Armenian - Western Armenian
Western Armenian - English
English - Western Armenian
Western Armenian - French
French - Western Armenian
Western Armenian - Turkish
Turkish - Western Armenian
